channel.title: TechnoTrumpet-Blog
channel.description: A tech veteran's journeys in coding

item.title: Changes
item.description:
Welcome to my humble site. Here, I will ramble, post about my coding journeys, and anything else I want.

Thanks for visiting.

item.title: Site Launch
item.description: Well. Finally got around to putting this old website together. Neat thing about it - powered by Jekyll and I can use Markdown to author my posts. It actually is a lot easier than I thought it was going to be.
